subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Playing with five different partners in 2015, the 6-foot-8-inch Melo added his homeland to the short list of nations that have produced top-ranked players in men’s singles and doubles.
snippet: Playing with five different partners in 2015, the 6-foot-8-inch Melo added his homeland to the short list of nations that have produced top-ranked players in men’s singles and doubles.
